node_not_exist: The entered ID does not match any member in the tree
cannot_delete_partner_with_children: You cannot delete a partner who has children. Delete the children first.
cannot_delete_child_with_relation_male: You cannot delete a son who has a wife. Delete the wife first.
cannot_delete_child_with_relation_female: You cannot delete a daughter who has a husband. Delete the husband first.
required_bigger_screen_title: Best viewed on a larger screen
required_bigger_screen_des_1: This application is designed to be enjoyed on larger screens.
required_bigger_screen_des_2: Try using a tablet or computer for a better experience.
app_slogan_2: And display it with an interactive unique design
share_your_family_tree_with_your_family_: Share your family tree with your family members!
private_description: Only added members can view the tree
public_description: Anyone with this link can view the tree
this_account_is_already_registered_pleas: Account already registered, please log in
account_is_not_registered_please_sign_up: Account not registered, please sign up
do_you_want_to_delete_the_tree: Do you want to delete the tree?
we_recommend_using_screen_with_width: We recommend using a screen with width
the_full_name_to_family_root: Full name of the family root
name: Name
display_family_tree_description: You can customize how the tree is displayed based on your preferences
choose_number_of_generation_for_tree: Choose the number of generations to display in the tree
wife_is_not_in_the_tree: The wife is not in the family tree
husband_is_not_in_the_tree: The husband is not in the family tree
wife_is_in_the_tree: The wife is in the family tree
husband_is_in_the_tree: The husband is in the family tree
show_unknown_description: Show unknown members in the tree
root_has_no_parents_siblings: This is a root node. There is no information about the the parents and the siblings
sorry_there_is_no_tree_under_this_link: Sorry there is no tree under this link
the_link_is_incorrect_or_tree_is_not_ava: The link may be incorrect or the tree is no longer available.
ask_tree_editor_to_send_the_right_link: Ask tree editor to send the right link
network_error_long: Check your connection and try again.
unexpected_long: Try again, and contact support if the issue persists.
unable_to_update_long: Please try again shortly, or refresh the page if it keeps happening.
insufficient_permission_short: You don’t have permission to do this.
insufficient_permission_long: Ask the tree owner to grant you access.
brothers_and_sisters_from_step_mother: Brothers and sisters from step mother
brothers_and_sisters_from_step_father: Brothers and sisters from step father
